item.title: Change client background image
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

[quote=“sgtlewis, post:1, topic:430445”]Ok i posted 1 time before, like i said im kinda new to rsps coding n stuff, but i know a good bit, i need help with:
[pi] changing the background on my client, i do not have a sprites folder, i know its got something to do with this code if(client.normalLogin == true) { //Image image = Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit().createImage(abyte0); Image image = Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit().createImage(location+"Background.png");
but i dont know where the picture is located please help me, i will legitimately pay some one 5 mill rs gold. [/quote]
Let’s assume you’ve got a file named background.png and it’s located in your cache directory. Let’s say that your client’s cache directory is in the same directory as the class files. This would make the location of the image in relation to the client ‘./cache/background.png’.

To load this image:

Image image = Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit().createImage("./cache/background.png");
